simlib.framework.Structure¶

class simlib.framework.Structure(data=None, topology=None)[source]¶

A Structure is an object that stores a single three-dimensional “structure”

“Structure” can be used loosely here because it applies to proteins, proteins in water baths, proteins in lipid environments, ligands in water, etc.

The Structure instance generally follows PDB format [1] in that in contains,

  • id

  • x

  • y

  • z

  • alpha

  • beta
